scripts.audit:ci: npm run audit:root && npm run audit:client && npm run audit:server
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all:ci: npm run test:frontend:ci && npm run test:backend:ci && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:backend:coverage
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: cd client && npm run type-check && cd ../server && npm run type-check
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:with-ngrok: concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT,NGROK" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev" "npm run dev:ngrok"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
